w:r.w:t: Buyers in Ethiopia face fragmented discovery of products on social media, inconsistent pricing, and risky payments.
Small vendors lack technical expertise to create secure online storefronts with payment integrations.
Admins need a secure, auditable platform to manage sellers and transactions.
A desktop-first, responsive web marketplace connecting verified buyers and sellers.
Secure payments via Chapa, inventory management, and admin moderation.
Focused MVP: discovery, purchase, fulfillment tracking, seller management, and platform security.
Buyers: browse, view, and purchase products securely.
Sellers: manage product catalog, inventory, orders, and bank info.
Admins: verify sellers, moderate listings, monitor orders, manage security.
Buyer: search & browse, product details, Buy Now + Chapa payment, order history, profile management.
), inventory tracking, order fulfillment, bank linking.
Admin: manual seller verification, suspend/ban users, product moderation, global order monitoring, API/security management.
Mobile native apps, social features, in-app messaging, AI recommendations, internationalization, automated payouts, advanced analytics, discount engines.
MVP adoption: 500–1000 users, 20 orders/day, page load <2s, API response <500ms.
Admin oversight: zero security breaches, verified seller approvals.
RBAC with ownership validation (buyers see only own orders, sellers manage own products, admins override).
Initial superuser seeded via CLI script.
Admin dashboard is restricted, requires JWT verification.
Audit logs for all sensitive admin actions.
Buyer: read/search products, checkout, manage profile.
Seller: CRUD own products, manage orders & bank info, view inventory.
Admin: verify sellers, suspend users, moderate products, global monitoring, security management.
Product details view (name, price, stock, images, seller info)
Race conditions on stock: atomic decrement & 409 error if sold out
Concurrent edits: optimistic concurrency with versioning
Admin actions on deleted users: 404 + audit log entry
Page load <2s, API response <500ms, CRUD writes <800ms
HTTPS, JWT + Refresh, Helmet, CORS, CSRF, XSS prevention, input validation
Initial: single instance with 50–100 concurrent users
PostgreSQL + JSONB for hybrid relational/flexible schema
Folder structure: modules, controllers, services, models, routes, middleware, utils, config, jobs, tests
for global state, React Query for server state
Folder structure: assets, components, features, hooks, layouts, pages, services, state, styles, themes, utils, tests
Git flow: main, dev, feature/* branches
CI/CD with pre-commit hooks, linting, formatting
Users (UUID PK, role, verified, JSONB metadata)
Products (FK owner, stock, status, JSONB attributes)
JWT + Refresh tokens (access in memory, refresh in
Redis caching deferred for MVP, but ready for search caching
CI/CD: GitHub Actions with linting, testing, build & deploy
Secrets managed via environment variables + rotation
Unit & integration tests (Jest + React Testing Library)
Load testing deferred, MVP target metrics tracked via GA4
Feature flags deferred for future experimentation
One-time payments via Chapa, ETB only
GDPR-lite: email-only user info, deletion on request
English interface only, i18n libraries in place for future localization
Modular architecture to minimize technical debt
CAPTCHA + rate-limiting + heuristic detection for bots
Account lockout + email notifications for brute-force attempts
Future: API-based models with versioning, cost monitoring, and input/output validation
User stories, technical architecture, DB schema
Setup PostgreSQL database with Drizzle ORM
Implement CLI script to seed initial admin account (superuser)
Setup middleware: JWT auth, rate limiting, Helmet, CORS, error handling
Environment config for API URLs and feature flags
Setup GitHub Actions for linting, testing, build, deploy
Optimistic concurrency control via version column
Product detail page (images, price, stock, seller info)
Seller dashboard: Add/Edit/Delete products, view stock
Admin dashboard: Approve/Reject products, global product view
Error handling for sold-out products (409 Conflict)
Buy Now flow (2–3 steps: Product → Confirm → Payment)
Seller order dashboard to update status
Display error messages for conflicts or invalid actions
Form validation with immediate user feedback
Email notifications: order confirmation, stock alerts
GA4 integration for page views, conversions, product clicks
Admin endpoints for seller verification, user suspension/ban
Admin dashboard: verification queue, user management, product moderation
Unit tests (Jest) for models, services, controllers
End-to-end test flow for Buy Now checkout, product CRUD, login
Monitoring & alerting for downtime or failed payments
Product detail page (images, description, stock, seller info)
CRUD endpoints with ownership checks + concurrency control
Checkout endpoint with atomic stock decrement
Conflict messages for sold-out items or concurrent edits
Loading spinners during payment or uploads
GA4: Track page views, product clicks, checkout conversion
Unit tests: Controllers, Services, DB Models
Integration tests: Auth, Product, Order endpoints
Sentry setup for runtime error logging
Write unit tests for models and services
: dependency Diagram of Shemsu MVP tasks
Initialize project, backend, frontend, and CI/CD. Ensure dev environment is fully operational.
Setup PostgreSQL with JSONB support and create dev/test databases
Configure Node.js/Express backend structure (Modules, Controllers, Services, Routes)
Setup environment variables and secret management for dev & prod
Working dev environment with backend + frontend scaffold
Database connected and ready for schema creation
Implement full user auth flows with secure tokens and email verification.
Implement backend auth API (signup/login, JWT + refresh tokens)
Email verification flow with token links and resend logic (
Frontend: Signup/Login pages, profile management, session persistence
Backend middleware for auth, role-based access (Buyer/Seller/Admin)
Add basic audit logging for user creation and login attempts
Users can create accounts, verify emails, and log in
JWT + refresh token system fully functional
Enable sellers to manage products with images, categories, and inventory.
Create Products & Categories DB schema (including JSONB for attributes)
Implement optimistic concurrency/versioning for product edits
Frontend pages: Seller dashboard, product listing, product details page
Sellers can add, edit, delete products with images
Versioning prevents overwrites from concurrent edits
Allow buyers to purchase products via Chapa with order tracking.
Create Orders DB schema with JSONB snapshot of items
Implement Orders API: create, update, track orders
Handle concurrency for stock decrements at purchase
Frontend checkout page: direct “Buy Now” flow
Enable admin verification, moderation, and platform monitoring.
Admin CLI script for initial superuser creation
Admin API: verify sellers, suspend users, moderate products, monitor global orders
Admin dashboard pages (React) with restricted access
Admin can approve sellers, ban users, moderate products
Security middleware: rate limiting, XSS/CSRF prevention, helmet, concurrency checks
Input validation everywhere (backend + frontend with Zod)
for contact forms and order confirmations
Users notified of key events (order creation, verification)
Ensure stability, error tracking, and performance monitoring.
Setup Google Analytics 4 for event tracking
Implement unit/integration/E2E tests for critical paths (auth, products, orders)
Load & stress test backend APIs for MVP concurrency levels
Analytics for product views and transactions
Tests ensure core flows are reliable
Deploy MVP and ensure smooth launch.
Final styling polish with Tailwind + Atomic Components
Verify HTTPS, environment variables, secrets, and CI/CD rollback strategies
QA: Manual testing of all flows
Buyers, sellers, and admin can perform their MVP tasks
